## Node Operator Application

Thank you for your interest in becoming a zk0 node operator! Please fill out this application form completely. We'll review your application and contact you via Discord for next steps.

### Contact Information

- **Name/Organization**: [Your full name or organization name]
- **Discord Username**: [Your Discord handle, e.g., @username#1234]
- **Email**: [Your email address for backup contact]
- **Location/Timezone**: [Your location and timezone, e.g., "San Francisco, PST"]

### Hardware Specifications

- **Operating System**: [e.g., Ubuntu 22.04, macOS 13, Windows 11 WSL2]
- **CPU**: [e.g., Intel i7-10700K, AMD Ryzen 9 5900X]
- **RAM**: [Amount in GB, e.g., 32GB]
- **GPU**: [Model and VRAM, e.g., NVIDIA RTX 3080 12GB, or "None"]
- **Storage**: [Available disk space in GB, e.g., 500GB SSD]
- **Network**: [Connection type and speed, e.g., "100Mbps broadband"]

### Dataset Information

- **Dataset Name**: [Name of your dataset]
- **Dataset Type**: [SO-100, SO-101, or Custom LeRobot-compatible]
- **Hosting Location**: [Hugging Face (hf:username/repo) or Local path]
- **Number of Episodes**: [Total episodes in your dataset]
- **Task Description**: [Brief description of the robotics task(s), e.g., "Pick and place colored objects", "Stack blocks of different sizes"]
- **Data Collection Method**: [How was the data collected? Real robot, simulation, etc.]
- **Episode Length**: [Average frames per episode]
- **Unique Aspects**: [What makes this dataset unique? Any special conditions or variations?]

### Experience & Background

- **Robotics Experience**: [Brief description of your robotics background]
- **Dataset Creation Experience**: [Have you created robotics datasets before?]
- **Federated Learning Familiarity**: [Any experience with FL or distributed systems?]
- **Availability**: [How often can you run the client? Daily, weekly, etc.]

### Privacy & Compliance

- **Data Ownership**: [Do you own this data or have permission to use it?]
- **Privacy Requirements**: [Any specific privacy constraints or requirements?]
- **Commercial Use**: [Will this data be used commercially? Any licensing restrictions?]

### Additional Information

- **Motivation**: [Why do you want to contribute to zk0?]
- **Special Requirements**: [Any special setup requirements or constraints?]
- **Questions/Comments**: [Any questions or additional information?]

### Checklist

- [ ] I have read and agree to the zk0 Node Operator Guidelines
- [ ] My dataset meets the minimum quality requirements (100+ episodes, clear annotations)
- [ ] I have verified my hardware meets the minimum requirements
- [ ] I understand that only model updates leave my machine (no raw data)
- [ ] I have a stable internet connection for federated learning
- [ ] I can dedicate the required compute resources during training rounds
- [ ] I take full responsibility for owning the contributed data and confirm I have the legal right to license the resulting model weights (from local training) to the zk0.bot community. I understand and agree that these model weights may be aggregated into a global shared model, licensed under the Apache License 2.0 (https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0), allowing the community unrestricted use for model training, inference, and any application (academic, DIY, or commercial). I have read and agree to the license terms.

---

**Next Steps**: After submitting this application, join our [zk0.bot Discord server](https://discord.gg/dhMnEne7RP) to ask questions, connect with the community, and check on your application status in real-time.
